Bitcoin Wallets

Bitcoin wallets (what is a Bitcoin wallet?) make payments global, easy, fast, and secure. More importantly, funds stored in true Bitcoin wallets give you full control of your money. Our wallet overviews help you find a Bitcoin wallet to suit your needs.

Cold Storage

Wallets built with security in mind. Your private keys are generated offline in a secure environment. Use cold storage wallets for secure storage.

Ledger Nano

TREZOR

Hot Wallets

Hot wallets give you full control over your private keys, but aren't built for long term secure storage of funds. Private keys are generated on an internet connected device. Treat hot wallets like you would your physical wallet. Hot wallets should only be used for spending money and users who make frequent payments.

Mycelium

Electrum

Bitcoin Wallet

Coinkite

GreenBits

GreenAddress

Blockchain.info

Buy/Sell Wallets

Buy/sell wallets are connected to your bank account or credit card. Use these wallets to go in and out of fiat currency.

Circle

Coinbase
